attributes.action: pass into law that all members of the government are held accountable for there actions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the government should be held accountable for its actions. if they state no tax rises and then raise them they should call elections for the public to decide there future. for too long the people have been lied to and betrayed by parliament. they are the ones who will get big pensions regardless of there performance or actions. this needs to stop. they take us into wars when they fabricate evidence. financially ruin the country with reckless spending and investment. this list can go on and on. the governments need to be stopped and held accountable. we need accountability so britain can be great again.
